# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-spotify-wrapper` will be documented in this file.

## 0.2.1 - 2018-11-27

- Fix some issues.

## 0.2.0 - 2018-11-27

- Refactor methods.

## 0.1.5 - 2018-11-26

- Make $api and $session properties public.

## 0.1.4 - 2018-11-19

- Add "Request Access Token" method.
- Add `show_dialog` option.

## 0.1.3 - 2018-11-15

- Fix some issues.

## 0.1.2 - 2018-11-15

- Minor changes.

## 0.1.1 - 2018-11-15

- Minor changes.

## 0.1.0 - 2018-11-15

- Initial pre-release.
